title: Glass & Mason ////// 451
description:
Glass & Mason ////// 451

Part 1 of 1


www.TrueCrimeGarage.com


Sometime between 10pm, December 2nd and noon December 3rd, 2010 two young women were murdered inside their home. Nicole Glass and Melissa Mason were killed in their East Phoenix home and the case remains unsolved. It has been 10 years and their families are still seeking answers and justice. Anyone with information is asked to call Silent Witness at 480-948-6377. There is a reward for information.

Beer of the Week - Must Go Faster by Tactical Brewing CompanyGarage Grade - 4 and 3 quarter bottle caps out of 5

The full archive of True Crime Garage is available on the Stitcher listening app - for FREE. Our show “Off the Record” is only on Stitcher Premium. For a FREE month of listening go to http://stitcherpremium.com/truecrimegarage and use promo code GARAGE

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
